original_title: Words And Silk: The Imaginary and Real Worlds of Gerald Murnane
overview: A documentary about the Australian fiction writer Gerald Murnane's love of writing and horse-racing. The film is an interwoven mosaic of still imagery, archival footage, dramatic recreations, and talking head, reflecting the film's fine-line between fact and fiction.
title: Words And Silk: The Imaginary and Real Worlds of Gerald Murnane
